page.title: 15TRADITIONAL COUNTRY SPORTS
page.content: The three traditional country sports are still much practiced here. This is the "Saturday area" of the Beaufort {Fox Hunt},& horse & hound are familiar, though not always welcomed by all.Hunt fields of over 100 mounted followers & dozens of spectators in cars block the lanes. Several members of the Royalfamily,living nearby,hunt with the Beaufort and can enjoy their sport without undue pressure from the public. Nowadays,noisy and sometimes violent demonstrations by Anti_hunt Saboteurs disrupt the day's proceedings. Many farmers rear Pheasants and {shooting}parties are regular features of the winter sporting scene. The river Avon at Pinkney Park provides good{fishing}for trout for the owners,and private fishing is available down stream at Easton Grey.
